description: This file implements the AuthApi class, which provides methods to request and verify OTP codes via an API client, including mock mode handling.

classes.name: AuthApi
classes.description: A class responsible for handling authentication-related API calls such as OTP request and verification, utilizing environment configuration and HTTP client.

methods.name: requestOtp
methods.description: Requests an OTP for the provided phone number. In mock mode, it simulates a delay and immediately resolves.

methods.name: verifyOtp
methods.description: Verifies the OTP code for a phone number. In mock mode, returns a dummy token; otherwise, performs an API call to verify and retrieve an auth token.
